file_insights.primary_purpose: Dynamic numeric limit checking system for SaaS platform

patterns_discovered: Async database querying for limit validation
gotchas_discovered: Handling unlimited limits with negative values
Potential performance impact of multiple database queries
Need to handle cases where no subscription or feature is found
Complex logic for determining limit source
recommendations: Add caching layer for limit queries to improve performance
Create more comprehensive error handling for edge cases
Consider adding logging for limit check events
Implement unit tests for complex limit checking scenarios
